contentrichtext.text: '''Hudson River Islands State Park''' or '''Hudson Islands Park''' is located on the [[Hudson River]] in [[New York]]. This park is in the Town of [[Coxsackie (town), New York|Coxsackie]] in [[Greene County, New York]]. It is open from [[Memorial Day]] to [[Columbus Day]]. The park offers fishing, hiking, hunting, a nature trail, and pavilions. It is accessible only by boat. ==See also== * [[List of New York state parks]] ==External links== * [http://nysparks.state.ny.us/parks/info.asp?parkID=107 New York State Parks: Hudson River Islands State Park] {{coord|42.319|-73.78|type:city_region:US|format=dms|display=title}} {{Protected Areas of New York}} [[Category:State parks of New York]] [[Category:Parks in Greene County, New York]] {{GreeneCountyNY-geo-stub}}
